"Polluter Destruction":
"The Darkers have deployed a pollution
device known as Darchyme in the ruins.
If left alone, these Darchyme will destroy
the ecosystem.

Your mission, ARKS, is to travel to the
depths of the ruins, and destroy the
Darchyme before they do any damage.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Fail to destroy the Darchyme"
